results.content: Ody, nice course, even though I thought you lacked video editing. I think it can really improve the video's quality to cut a few moments where you are looking into the next moves and nothing is happening, and prepare a little more on the endings to the next topics. The final work was great. I don't know when was posted but there are a few updates available, as in every course there will be.
